title: Spot's GOITOBER2023 Submissions
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:halloween]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
+++ A compilation of [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goitober2023  GOITOBER2023] art by [[*user spotkitty]]

[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 1: Chicago Spirit" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/DGZHwL3.png]]

+++++ Snitches get stiches. 

+++++ For context, read [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3855 SCP-3855] by ObserverSeptember. 
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+Day 2: Ruiz Duchamp" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/rnogQb7.png]]

+++++ Ruiz Duchamp builds the Pyramids of Giza. 

+++++ A short comic based off of a scene from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ruiz-dies-again Ruiz Dies Again] by [[*user DrGooday]]

+++++ Further context: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-just-shattered It Just Shattered] by [[*user Randomini]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+Day 3: Three Moons Initiative" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/J7BRU7R.png]]

+++++ SCP-2922-B ‚Äî General Janet Spiegel.

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2922 SCP-2922] by [[*user daveyoufool]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[collapsible show="+Day 4: Nameless" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/R24ylXm.png]]

+++++ Would you join him?

+++++ The rabbit fae from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/taboo Taboo] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 5: Fifthist" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/GPvdLVS.png]]

+++++ The pink light. 

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3005 SCP-3005] by [[*user Silberescher]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 6: bones" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/hwhLoRQ.png]]

+++++ Don't mess with the alien planet destroying satellite. 

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/hogslice-vs-bones HOGSLICE vs bones] by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 7: Valravn" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/q1Hzb1O.png]]

+++++ "My mother hid me in the corn sacks and told me not to move or scream no matter what I saw or heard. I saw her get dismembered in front of my own eyes‚Ä¶ and I could not scream." -Jacinta 

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6038 SCP-6038] by [[*user Kilerpoyo]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 8: SAPPHIRE" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/1CwIjfd.png]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/WgL8p5j.png]]

+++++ POLL: Is @therealsavior the real Jesus Christ?
+++++ >1. Yes
+++++ >2. No

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7678 SCP-7678] by [[*user AwhRyan]]
+++++ Inspiration for Void Format and SAPPHIRE Void account: [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-first-occult-flame-war The First Occult Flame War] by [[*user Guezma]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 9: Eric" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/a2q7Bdy.png]]

+++++ Since it is October, here is a drawing of Box (SCP-6080) dressed as a vampire.
+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6080 SCP-6080] by [[*user ValidClay]], [[*user ratking666]], and [[*user JackalRelated]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 10: Pangloss" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/F8DLweM.png]]

+++++ "Don't let the fire die" -Pangloss
+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1612 SCP-1612] by [[*user FlameShirt]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 12: Grand Karcist Ion" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/hLhs4pz.png]]

+++++ "Whatever the reason, in the instant that his heart started beating, his body began to grow. And grow. And grow. The carnomancy placed inside him boiled out of control like a cancer. By the time the Great Karcist had realized what was happening, it was too late; there was no taking away a gift he had already given." -Cain (SCP-7376-C)
+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7376 SCP-7376] by [[*user MontagueETC]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 13: PARAWATCH" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/d6f3gic.jpg]]

+++++ Former Parawatch member Ron Gambi (left) and his best friend Alyx (right). 
+++++ Based on [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/voice-of-vanguard Voice of Vanguard] and [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/facing-forward Facing Forward] by [[*user Guezma]].
+++++ Ron Gambi's design based on [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCP/comments/wdj405/i_commissioned_ulovemarginal_to_draw_ron_gambi/ this artpiece] by [[*user LOVEMARGINAL]].
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 14: Isabel V" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/LZxiFzu.jpg]]

+++++ Isabel and Oppy.
+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-funeral-on-mars A Funeral on Mars] by [[*user Djoric]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 16: Vikander-Kneed" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/nKwGCbn.png]]

+++++ Looks like Mari MacPherson wants to show off her --human head-- pumpkin carving skills that she learned from Sam Hain. Don't worry, the pumpkin is --probably-- fine. 
+++++ Sam Hain from [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6750 SCP-6750] by [[*user PlaguePJP]] and [[*user J Dune]]
+++++ Mari MacPherson (first introduced in [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6123 SCP-6123]) by [[*user Grigori Karpin]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 18: Thilo Zwist" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/maSzTIa.jpg]]

+++++ --Garfield-- Polk the Lazy Cat.

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5382 SCP-5382] by [[*user HarryBlank]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Day 29: Just Girly Things" hide="- close"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/Q3oSzyp.jpg]]

+++++ ‚ú®üòç‚ù§Ô∏è**MY PERFECT HUSBAND AND I**‚ù§Ô∏èüòç‚ú®

+++++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/we-can-t-plan-out-our-lives-or-can-we We can't plan out our lives, or can we?] by [[*user DianaBerry]]
[[/collapsible]]
author: spotkitty
